notes: Successive attacks with Witch Blade do not stack, but refresh the duration instead.
The attack first apply the debuff, then its own damage.
Does not work against buildings, wards, or allied units.
Deals damage in 1 second intervals, starting 1 second after the debuff is placed, resulting in 3 instances.
Can deal up to 300% of intelligence as damage to the target (before reductions).
abilities.description: Causes your next attack to apply a poison for 3 seconds, slowing by 25% and dealing 1x your intelligence as damage every second.

additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 6 armor, 35 attack speed, 144 mana and 0.6 mana regen.
For agility heroes, it grants 6 armor, 35 attack speed, 144 mana and 0.6 mana regen.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 6 armor, 35 attack speed, 144 mana, 0.6 mana regen and 12 attack damage.
The projectile speed bonus only affects attack projectiles.
name: Witch Blade
description: A spiteful blade inadvertently possessed by the soul of its incautious creator.
